Params[3]: As the Support Force member said, can I trouble you to help me decide on a new look for the frame, Commandant?

Params[2]: I can't really decide so suddenly.
Params[4]: I think it's already great as it is.

Params[3]: The Support Force already sent me a few sketches, Commandant, maybe you can choose one from them...
...The original, no, the Support Force already sent me a few sketches, Commandant, maybe you can choose a more suitable one...
For the record, I have to say, none of these sketches should ever be approved.
I don't know who submitted these, but no one would want to lay their eyes on a gorilla or a pitch-black version of Lucia.
It's not only meaningless but it'll also cause immense damage to our team's overall image.
I never thought Lee would be so against it... What if I chose a design similar to my current frame?
It looks good, but this hairstyle...
...They don't make sense on the battlefield.
I don't think twin tails should appear in battle.
